players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out today to protect the town."
Diana: "Bob is confirmed mafia by me. Trust me and vote him out now before he kills again."
Charlie: "Bob has remained silent twice now, which is suspicious. Diana is pushing hard to vote him out. We need to decide carefully—maybe Bob is innocent and Diana is trying to mislead us."
